group_1.textLeft: Crap, she's way too late…!
Chizuru…she must've been caught@in the temple…

group_1.textRight: I'll go in next.
I'm the only one here Gen'un might listen to…
But if he has harmed Chizuru, I will not@let him get away with it.

group_1.textLeft: Keep it together, Princess.
Don't give in to your temper and attack him.
Otherwise, they might see it as an act@of treason from the Mizuna Clan…

group_1.textRight: Of course. I'll hold fast…
Tsuruno, Sana, you two ought to meet with the@Taito leader and explain the situation.
If it's just a matter of crossing Endless Hell,@Sana can probably navigate it herself.
After all, no one else should be able to see you.
Let's get going, Tsuruno.

group_1.textLeft: Right.
Be careful, Tsuyu.

group_1.textRight: I will.

group_1.textLeft: What's brought you out here at this hour?

group_1.textRight: I see that I'm welcome here today.

group_1.textLeft: Tsuyu, you know we've been preparing@for the strike on Taito tomorrow.
We couldn't spare any time to meet.

group_1.textRight: Please, can't you reconsider…?@The Taito Gang does not use Demons.

group_1.textLeft: You refuse to accept that ancient letter?

group_1.textRight: Yes. You believe these old stories, Gen'un,@but times have changed.
If we could just communicate with each other,@we would find a solution…!

group_1.textLeft: If your naivety prolongs this famine,@countless more people will die!

group_1.textRight: …Mm. I see.
I just have one more thing to ask of you.
Tonight…did anything unusual happen?@Perhaps at, say, the temple…?

group_1.textLeft: We've had a lot of rats scurrying around@here lately.
I did away with one tonight.

group_1.textRight: Nnn…grrr…!

group_1.textLeft: I've known you since you were a little girl,@but I've never seen you wear that expression.

group_1.textRight: How DARE you…that girl…she's my…@to me, she is…!

group_1.textLeft: Put yourself in perspective!

group_1.textRight: *Gasp*

group_1.textLeft: Lay a hand on me now and it will spell@the end of Mizuna…!

group_1.textRight: Mmph…nngh…urgh…

group_1.textLeft: The situation has changed. We can't let rats@run underfoot anymore...
Once all of this is over, I'll tell you your@favorite stories again.

group_1.textRight: I am not a child anymore…!

group_1.textLeft: …Forgive me.

group_1.textRight: So while we were trying to stop@Lords Sumiya and Kumai,
Chizuru snuck into the temple, and…@she never came back…

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100300:effect_7000_attack01]HRAAAAAAAAH!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100300:effect_7002_damage01][se:3001_chara_damage][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Gah…

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]GRAAAAH!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][chara:100300:effect_shake][se:3001_chara_damage]Aah!
Tsuruno…!

group_1.textLeft: I don't know if this will even work,
but sorry, little girl. You'll be my hostage.

group_1.textRight: Ugh, gah…
This is a disaster!
Calm down, Sana.
Saemon Banshu knows nothing@of our existence.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly…
Sana, right now, you're the only one who can@tell Tsuyu what's happening…

group_1.textRight: But Tsuruno…

group_1.textLeft: Chizuru's dad might be reckless,@but he knows the score.
He's not gonna try killing me.
So hurry back to Princess Tsuyu and explain@everything…

group_1.textRight: …Got it.
